authorizeFeedback(uint256,uint256).details: Authorizes a client agent to provide feedback for a server agent

params.agentClientId: The ID of the client agent
params.agentServerId: The ID of the server agent

returns.feedbackAuthId: The unique identifier for this feedback authorization

getClientAuthorizationCount(uint256).details: Gets the number of feedback authorizations for a client agent

getClientFeedbackAuthorizations(uint256).details: Gets all feedback authorizations for a specific client agent

returns.isAuthorized: Whether the authorization is still valid
Whether the authorization is still valid

getServerAuthorizationCount(uint256).details: Gets the number of feedback authorizations for a server agent

getServerFeedbackAuthorizations(uint256).details: Gets all feedback authorizations for a specific server agent

getTotalAuthorizations().details: Gets the total number of feedback authorizations

isFeedbackAuthorized(bytes32).details: Checks if feedback is authorized for a given authorization ID

params.feedbackAuthId: The feedback authorization ID to check

revokeFeedbackAuthorization(bytes32).details: Revokes a feedback authorization (only the original authorizer can revoke)

params.feedbackAuthId: The feedback authorization ID to revoke

returns.success: True if the revocation was successful
